DocAttribute.Name: Identification
DocAttribute.Documentation:
An identifying designation given to a resource. It is the identifier at the occurrence level.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE Attribute promoted from subtype _IfcConstructionResource_.

DocAttribute.Name: LongDescription
ResourceOf
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of relationships to other objects, e.g. products, processes, controls, resources or actors, for which this resource object is a resource.
